entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
